param.name: byteStream
param.para: Type: *
A pointer to the interface for the data source to add.

param.name: label
param.para: Type: LPCWSTR
Null-terminated wide-character string that contains the label of the data source.

param.name: language
param.para: Type: LPCWSTR
Null-terminated wide-character string that contains the language of the data source.

param.name: kind
param.para: Type:
A -typed value that specifies the kind of timed-text track.

param.name: isDefault
param.para: Type: BOOL
Specifies whether to add the default data source. Specify TRUE to add the default data source or FALSE otherwise.

param.name: trackId
param.para: Type: DWORD*
Receives a pointer to the unique identifier for the added track.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Adds a timed-text data source from the specified URL.

param.name: url
param.para: Type: LPCWSTR
The URL of the timed-text data source.

param.name: label
param.para: Type: LPCWSTR
Null-terminated wide-character string that contains the label of the data source.

param.name: language
param.para: Type: LPCWSTR
Null-terminated wide-character string that contains the language of the data source.

param.name: kind
param.para: Type:
A -typed value that specifies the kind of timed-text track.

param.name: isDefault
param.para: Type: BOOL
Specifies whether to add the default data source. Specify TRUE to add the default data source or FALSE otherwise.

param.name: trackId
param.para: Type: DWORD*
Receives a pointer to the unique identifier for the added track.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the list of active timed-text tracks in the timed-text component.

param.name: activeTracks
param.para: Type: **
A pointer to a memory block that receives a pointer to the interface that can enumerate the list of active timed-text tracks.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the offset to the cue time.

param.name: offset
param.para: Type: double*
A pointer to a variable that receives the offset to the cue time.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the list of the timed-metadata tracks in the timed-text component.

param.name: metadataTracks
param.para: Type: **
A pointer to a memory block that receives a pointer to the interface that can enumerate the list of the timed-metadata tracks.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the list of all the timed-text tracks in the timed-text component.

param.name: textTracks
param.para: Type: **
A pointer to a memory block that receives a pointer to the interface that can enumerate the list of all of the timed-text tracks.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Retrieves a list of all timed-text tracks registered with the .

param.name: tracks
param.para: Type: IMFTimedTextTrackList**
Receives a pointer to track list.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Determines whether inband mode is enabled.

returns.para: Type: BOOL
Returns whether inband mode is enabled. If TRUE, inband mode is enabled. If FALSE, inband mode is disabled.

param.name: notify
param.para: Type: *
A pointer to the interface for the timed-text notify object to register.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Removes the timed-text track with the specified identifier.

param.name: track
param.para: Type: DWORD
The identifier of the track to remove.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: Get the identifier for a track by calling .
When a track is removed, all buffered data from the track is also removed.

summary.para: Selects or deselects a track of text in the timed-text component.

param.name: trackId
param.para: Type: DWORD
The identifier of the track to select.

param.name: selected
param.para: Type: BOOL
Specifies whether to select or deselect a track of text. Specify TRUE to select the track or FALSE to deselect the track.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Sets the offset to the cue time.

param.name: offset
param.para: Type: double
The offset to the cue time.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

param.name: enabled
param.para: Type: BOOL
Specifies whether inband mode is enabled. If TRUE, inband mode is enabled. If FALSE, inband mode is disabled.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: A timed-text object represents a component of timed text.
